page.title: 02Horticulture
page.content: {The Vineries}is a nursery in Lambs Green.Flower and vegetable plants are raised and are sold to shops in Crawley and to customers who come to the nursery.There are several plastic greenhouses,one of which is heated, and a total of 5 acres of land.The owners Mr and Mrs Shaw do all the work themselves without any employees, which involves a very early start to the day in the summer when watering has to be carried out.There is an 18 foot deep well which never dries up, and this can be used for watering in times of drought.Runner beans and marrows are grown to maturity and the produce sold through local shops.
